name: Anchorman
description:
You play as a pirate captain whose crew staged a mutiny against you. You now find yourself walking the plank with an anchor tied around your waist.

Waking up in davey jones locker, the anchor which dragged you down to certain doom has now become your most trusted ally.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD

With anchor in hand:

  • Melee attack - Left mouse button
  • Throw anchor - Right mouse button
  • Aim - Mouse

Empty hands:

  • Drag anchor back - Hold left or right mouse button

NOTE: Particle effects didn't make it to the WebGL version! See it in it's full glory on with the windows build below :)
